meanings.definition: A white crystalline compound used in medical research.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the effects of alloxans on cells in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The alloxans were carefully measured before being added to the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The curious scientist accidentally spilled alloxans all over the lab bench.
meanings.sent4: The purity of the research was as clear as alloxans in a test tube.
meanings.sent5: The students marveled at the beauty of the alloxans under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A substance that can induce diabetes in laboratory animals.
meanings.sent1: The researchers injected the mice with alloxans to study diabetes.
meanings.sent2: The effects of alloxans on the rats were carefully monitored by the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lab assistant accidentally mixed up the alloxans with sugar cubes.
meanings.sent4: The impact of the alloxans on the animals was like a storm brewing in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The danger of alloxans causing diabetes in the animals was a constant concern for the researchers.
